channel.title: Development on Pascal's dev blog
channel.description: Recent content in Development on Pascal's dev blog

item.title: Creating a mobile application with React Native - part 2
item.description:
This article is the second in a series started with Creating a mobile application with React Native - part 1.

Today, we will enrich our basic app with a list of albums provided by the deezer API. We will use Native Base, which is a complement to React Native. It provides higher level, polished components and layouts, for both iOS and Android.

item.title: Creating a mobile application with React Native - part 1
item.description: These is the first post of a series dedicated to the creation of a mobile application for both Android and iOS.
